page.title: 06PARMITER'S NEAR WARDOUR.
page.content: {Parmiter's}was founded by{Philip {Joseph Parmiter.}It was built on the foundation of an{old gas works.}The factory makes{farm machinery}and employs{140 people. Parmiter's}make cultivation and mechanical handling equipment which goes to{70 countries all over the world.The men work a basic{39 hour week}with overtime at 10.5 hours.The first machinery made was called a{Flexible Harrow. {Parmiter's}is situated by a{railway {station}which in the past has been used for transportation.Now however they have a fleet of 7 lorries.We saw a man making a{disc harrow.}We saw my dad making something. A man told us that only one woman works on the machinery.Two men were painting the machinery first green then blue. Some finished machinery was labelled{SHOW. {Josephine Tony Shelley
